name: Mob Game
description:
You are a man happily married to his wife. But when she is kidnapped by a mob boss because of your giant gambling debt, you must figure out a way to rescue her.

"Mob Game" is an interactive short film experience. Watch the live action video and make choices.  Some choices are just for fun. Others will determine whether you win or lose.

Can you make it to the credits? Or will it be Game Over? The choice is up to you.
